lequipe.description: JS engineer, works at l'Équipe on their lequipe.fr universal website, a progressive web app created with VueJS. Implemented various features such as dark mode, landing pages, 3ds paiement tunnel, from concept through deployment.
lequipe.firstMissons: Collaborate with product, marketing team, and back-end developers to implement new features;Assess UX and UI designs for technical feasibility;Maintain sites and pages ex: le journal, la chaine L'Équipe, customer service, refactoring and debug of existing code;Data, advertising, SEO (tracking, DFP, smart refresh, user consents);Account generation, subscription (google sign-in, one tap sign-in, auto-promo management, targeted offer and pop-ins);Tests and code review;Projects from scratch to deployment: dark mode, landing pages, 3d secure payment tunnel, player pip…
technologies: GitLab, Jira, Jenkins, Docker, Git, VS Code, Webpack, ESLint, StyleLint, Babel, Vue CLI, Zeplin, Sketch, Adobe Suite

orange.description: Coder, designer, facilitator. Worked closely with the innovation and development manager, on UX / UI design and website development at the request of internal customers.
orange.firstMissons: Analysis of customer needs and transform them into wireframe;Construction of single-page-application in Vue.js;Visual, interactive experiments, data visualization;Modifications and Maintenance of existing sites (jQuery and other technologies);Coaching clients on interface design, participation in the design of collective intelligence workshops

secondMissons.text: Quick prototyping using Tachyons CSS and Bootstrap;Responsive Design and Adaptive Design.

technologies: Vue CLI, Git, Visual Studio, ESLint, Prettier, Babel, Sketch, Adobe Suite

cards.caption: Konbini: 'Plastic Arcade', quand le jeu vidéo devient écolo
France 24: Sensibiliser à la pollution plastique grâce au jeu vidéo

thecamp.firstMissons: Make prototypes and interaction ideas with Javascript (p5.js and Canvas API);Supervise the development of the games, review design according to technical feasibility;Creation of interactive art installations, explore interaction possibilities with Kinect, Arduino, Leap Motion etc;Proof of concepts during different phases of the residency, with experts of the domaine;Participate in workshops with sponsors of thecamp: SNCF, Airbus, LVMH, etc…
technologies: Git, Visual Studio, Vue CLI, AWS CLI, Arduino IDE, Processing IDE, Unity

expos.title: Biennal SIANA, 2019
expos.content: Datalaxy presents 'where-s-jane', an installation that questions the transparency and clarity of the data collection behind our daily usage of social network, by showing an interactive visualisation of a Facebook user's data

expos.title: Inventivités digitales, Le Cube, 2019
expos.content: Exposition of the major Id-dim by IMT-BS, Télécom Sud Paris and ESAD Reims, where Datalaxy presents 'where-s-jane'

expos.title: Festival Rouxteur, Mains d'Œuvres, 2018
expos.content: An increased exhibition with three works on the theme 'Traverser la mer sans que le ciel ne le sache'

expos.content:
Tintamarres #7, Tintamarres #8, Composition: "Machine 1-10", "CB2"

expos.content: Performs at the Printemps de Bourges, Scène Berry, contest 'Printemps des Grandes Écoles'.

education.content: Post-Diploma, BAC + 5, Specialization "Digital Inventivities": multidisciplinary and collaborative, halfway between management, gesign and engineering
